name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Notes - Copy text and take screenshots

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of Ctrl+C/V, or switching between windows? Try Make Notes to smoothly copy text and take screenshots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture and copy anything from webpage effortlessly with our extension â€“ your ultimate tool for text and screenshot freedom!

*** Important Points ***
1. Based on user feedback, we changed the text copy key from 'D' to 'Cmd' (for Mac) / 'Ctrl' (for PC).

2. As stated in the picture, clicking the 'back' button triggers an automatic save, but closing the side panel doesn't!!! Remember to save before closing the side panel.
